âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Bundles ES Modules, CommonJS, and AMD modules â€¢ Creates single or multiple asynchronously loaded chunks â€¢ Resolves dependencies during compilation â€¢ Uses loaders for preprocessing files (e.g., TypeScript to JavaScript, images to Base64) â€¢ Highly modular plugin system
ðŸ“– Summary: Webpack is a module bundler that primarily bundles JavaScript files for browsers. It supports various module types (ES Modules, CommonJS, AMD), allows for asynchronous loading of chunks, and offers loaders for preprocessing assets. Its modular plugin system enables extensive customization.
